## getOptionConfig() function

获取枚举配置

**Signature:**

```typescript
getOptionConfig: (value: number, array: {
    value: number;
    label: string;
    type?: number;
}[]) => {
    value: number;
    label: string;
    type?: number | undefined;
} | {
    label: null;
    type: null;
}
```
